application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

figure.head: What
figure.figDesc: Tork & Mork tell us Hey Mork ! With some of my colleagues, I'd like to put musical scores online. But I don't know what I can do and how to proceed! Can you help me? Well Tork, use the SSK! I think the scenario "Collaborative Digital Edition of a Musical Corpus" can be very useful for you. It will guide you through all the necessary steps to put these scores online, and present the best practices associated to each of these steps.

div.head: Three layers
div.p: • Us Scenario A complete and generic research use case composed of several steps to be followed.

div.head: Step
div.p: A unique task to be performed inside a scenario with the help and recommendation of one or several resources.

div.head: Resource
div.p: A standardized tool / service / document guiding the researcher in her/his tasks completion.

div.head: Managing resources
div.p: The scenarios are described using the TEI format (Text Encoding Initiative). All the information displayed within the SSK proceed from TEI files.
